comprehensive_overview: JasPer (JPEG-2000 Part-1 Suite) is an open-source software implementation of the JPEG-2000 Part-1 standard. It provides a complete set of tools for encoding and decoding JPEG-2000 streams, including color space conversion, wavelet transforms, quantization, and entropy coding.
core_features:
1. Support for encoding and decoding JPEG-2000 images
2. Color space conversion
3. Wavelet transforms
4. Quantization
5. Entropy coding
